scripts.buildPub: npm run build:lib && npm publish --registry http://registry.npmjs.org && npm run bashGit
scripts.pub: npm run bashGitBefore && npm version prerelease && npm run buildPub
scripts.pub:patch: npm run bashGitBefore && npm version patch && npm run buildPub
scripts.pub:minor: npm run bashGitBefore && npm version minor && npm run buildPub
scripts.pub:major: npm run bashGitBefore && npm version major && npm run buildPub
